crops.name: rice
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in well-puddled soil, maintain 2-3 cm water level, transplant seedlings at 20-25 days old.

crops.name: maize
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 60 cm apart, plant seeds 3-4 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: jute
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in well-drained soil, maintain soil moisture, thin seedlings to 5-7 cm apart.

crops.name: cotton
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 90-120 cm apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure proper irrigation.

crops.name: coconut
crops.seed_type: West Coast Tall, Chowghat Orange Dwarf, Kalpa Vriksha
crops.sowing_practices: Plant seedlings in pits of 1x1x1 m, ensure good drainage, irrigate regularly.

crops.name: papaya
crops.seed_type: Red Lady, Pusa Dwarf, Coorg Honey Dew
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in nursery, transplant seedlings at 6-8 weeks, maintain spacing of 1.8x1.8 m.

crops.name: orange
crops.sowing_practices: Plant in pits of 60x60x60 cm, ensure good drainage, irrigate regularly.

crops.name: apple
crops.sowing_practices: Plant in pits of 1x1x1 m, ensure good drainage, irrigate regularly.

crops.name: muskmelon
crops.seed_type: Hales Best Jumbo, Sugar Cube, Athena
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 1.5-2 m apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: watermelon
crops.seed_type: Sugar Baby, Crimson Sweet, Charleston Gray
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 1.5-2 m apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: grapes
crops.sowing_practices: Plant cuttings in pits of 60x60x60 cm, ensure good drainage, train vines on trellis.

crops.name: mango
crops.sowing_practices: Plant in pits of 1x1x1 m, ensure good drainage, irrigate regularly.

crops.name: banana
crops.sowing_practices: Plant suckers in pits of 45x45x45 cm, ensure good drainage, irrigate regularly.

crops.name: pomegranate
crops.sowing_practices: Plant in pits of 60x60x60 cm, ensure good drainage, irrigate regularly.

crops.name: lentil
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 30 cm apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: blackgram
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 30 cm apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: mungbean
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 30 cm apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: mothbeans
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 30 cm apart, plant seeds 2-3 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: pigeonpeas
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 60 cm apart, plant seeds 4-5 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: kidneybeans
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 45 cm apart, plant seeds 3-4 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: chickpea
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in rows 30 cm apart, plant seeds 4-5 cm deep, ensure adequate moisture.

crops.name: coffee
crops.sowing_practices: Sow in nursery, transplant seedlings at 6-8 months, maintain spacing of 2x2 m.
